reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. LITCO v. WORKERS COMP., Unpublished Decision (10-13-1999)

caption.center: State ex rel. Litco Wood Products, Inc. v. Ohio Bur. of Workers' Comp.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Franklin App. No. 96APD08-1036.

opinion_text.unpublished:
Judgment affirmed and writ denied.
Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
